itemJsonDatas.Name: CooperOre
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from mining CooperVein.

itemJsonDatas.Name: IronOre
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from mining IronVein.

itemJsonDatas.Name: GoldOre
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from mining GoldVein.

itemJsonDatas.Name: CoalOre
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from mining CoalVein.

itemJsonDatas.Name: QuartzOre
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from mining QuartzVein.

itemJsonDatas.Name: CooperIngot
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from smeting cooperore.

itemJsonDatas.Name: IronIngot
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from smeting IronOre.

itemJsonDatas.Name: GoldIngot
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from smeting GoldOre.

itemJsonDatas.Name: CoalIngot
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from smeting CoalOre. it is ingredient of steel

itemJsonDatas.Name: SiliconIngot
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from smeting QuartzOre. It can be a siliconwafer if sliced thinly.

itemJsonDatas.Name: CrudeOil
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from drilling groundcrack. it can be used only after refination.

itemJsonDatas.Name: RefinedOil
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from refining crudeoil. it is main ingredient of plastic.

itemJsonDatas.Name: Lubricant
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from refining crudeoil. it reduces friction.

itemJsonDatas.Name: Plastic
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is made from oil and lubricant. it is light and bends well compared to steel.

itemJsonDatas.Name: Steel
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is made from coalingot and ironingot. it is main ingredient of buildings.

itemJsonDatas.Name: CopperWire
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from slicing copperingot. it has high electrical conductivity.

itemJsonDatas.Name: GoldPowder
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from slicing goldingot. it is used in for plating.

itemJsonDatas.Name: SiliconWafer
itemJsonDatas.Description: It is obtained from slicing siliconingot. it required delicate techniques.

itemJsonDatas.Name: Coil
itemJsonDatas.Description: it is bundle of copperwires. can make motor.

itemJsonDatas.Name: Motor
itemJsonDatas.Description: a device used to convert electrical energy into mechanical energy.

itemJsonDatas.Name: SolarPanel
itemJsonDatas.Description: a device used to convert sun's ray and convert them into electrical energy.

itemJsonDatas.Name: ICChip
itemJsonDatas.Description: main ingredient of CPU. it is essential for a logical function.

itemJsonDatas.Name: RobotBody
itemJsonDatas.Description: a part of robot. but can't control itself.

itemJsonDatas.Name: CPU
itemJsonDatas.Description: The key component of Robot. A robot without a CPU is just a lump of scrap metal.

itemJsonDatas.Name: Robot
itemJsonDatas.Description: basic robot. parts can be added if necessary.
